name: Snake Maze.
description:
Welcome to Snake Maze.

Conquer over 72 Mazes, across 6 different worlds, each more challenging than the previous!
Simply have fun and escape safely or master each Maze by collecting all 3 stars!

Controls:
•Swipe Up to move Up
•Swipe Down to move Down
•Swipe Left to move Left
•Swipe Right to move Right

See you in the Maze.
